Title: AN ACT AUTHORIZING AN ADDITIONAL APPROPRIATION OF ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS AS AID FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT OF NEW ELEMENTARY CLASSES.
Data:
[ Acts No. 4213, August 03, 1935 ]
AN ACT AUTHORIZING AN ADDITIONAL APPROPRIATION OF ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS AS AID FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT OF NEW ELEMENTARY CLASSES.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The sum of one hundred thousand pesos is hereby appropriated, out of any funds in the Insular Treasury not otherwise appropriated, for the salaries of teachers of new elementary classes in the barrio or central schools of the Philippine Islands.
Section 2. The amount herein appropriated shall be distributed by the Director of Education with the approval of the Secretary of Public Instruction: Provided, That, any provision of the existing law to the contrary notwithstanding, no unexpended balance of the amount appropriated herein for salaries of teachers shall be transferred to the credit of the Teachers' Pension and Disability Fund: And provided, further, That no municipality or city shall receive aid from this fund unless the barrio or poblacion where the new class is to be established meets the ordinary requirements of attendance and has on the date of the approval of this Act an adequate school site and a suitable building for holding classes.1a—àphi1
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, August 3, 1935.
